basicInfo.name: The Belgian Waffle Co.
basicInfo.cuisine_string: Waffle, Pancake, Ice Cream, Desserts, Beverages

establishment.address: G-11, Marvella Business Hub, Opposite RTO Pal, Adajan Gam, Surat
establishment.res_chain_text: See all 10 The Belgian Waffle Co. outlets in Surat

items.name: Happiness in mini version + 1 FREE Delight
items.description: Buy Chocolate Mini Waffle Combo pack of 6 and select 1 FREE waffle or pancake from our top picks.

items.name: Keep Cake & Celebrate + 1 FREE Delight
items.description: Choose any one double layer waffle cake- Death by chocolate Waffle Cake (Double Layer)/ Red velvet waffle Cake (Double Layer)/ Kiki and Oreo Cream waffle cake (Double Layer) and select 1 FREE waffle or pancake from our top picks.

items.name: The Belgian Club + 1 Free Delight (Milk)
items.description: Buy Belgian chocolate [Milk] waffle and select 1 FREE waffle or pancake from our top picks.

items.name: The Belgian Club + 1 Free Delight (Dark)
items.description: Buy 3 Belgian Chocolate waffle (Dark) and get a free delight (Free Delight: kiki and oreo cream pancake or triple chocolate pancake or belgian chocolate waffle or maple butter waffle)

items.name: Best Of The Best
items.description: Share our besties with your besties! Choose any 5 best-selling Waffle from below list for a flat price! (Naked Nutella or Triple Chocolate or Belgian Chocolate Milk or Belgian Chocolate Dark or KitKat Waffle or Red Velvet).

items.name: Mini Treats
items.description: Treat your tribe! Save Rs. 67 flat & enjoy Mini Waffle pack of 4 (assorted) + Mini Waffle pack of 4 (chocolate).

items.name: The WaffShake Duo
items.description: Triple Chocolate Waffle + Belgian Chocolate Shake.

items.name: Make At Home @ Rs.375
items.description:
Save Rs. 72. Make our delicious waffles or pancakes in the comfort
of your home with our Chocolate Oats Pancake & Waffle Mix !

items.name: Make At Home @ Rs.349
items.description:
Save Rs. 78. Make our delicious waffles or pancakes in the comfort 
of your home with our Original Pancake & Waffle Mix !

items.name: Treats For Two
items.description: 1 for you, 1 for me & 1 for us. Save Rs. 52 flat & enjoy Belgian Chocolate Milk Waffle + Red Velvet Waffle + Signature Cold Coffee.

items.name: Death by Chocolate Waffle Cake (Single Layer)
items.description: Signature dark chocolate single layer waffle cake layered with creamy White, Milk and Dark melted Belgian Chocolate. Triple the chocolate, triple the fun! (Sorry! Our special waffle cakes do not allow for any customization. We do not provide candles or cutlery with this order)

items.name: Berry Red Velvet Waffle Cake (Single Layer)
items.description:
"Original Red Velvet Single Layer Waffle Cake With Strawberry Compote + Creamy Cheesecake* filling And Melted White Chocolate Topped With Red Velvet Crumbs. A True Original - Enhanced!
*Cheesecake flavour filling, contains spray dried cheese powder
 (Sorry! Our special waffle cakes do not allow for any customization. We do not provide candles or cutlery with this order)"

items.name: Kiki & Oreo Waffle Cake (Single Layer)
items.description: Signature black velvet single layer waffle cake layered thick with Kiki spread and topped with Crushed Oreos. A universal favorite! (Sorry! Our special waffle cakes do not allow for any customization. We do not provide candles or cutlery with this order)

items.name: Almond Brownie Waffle Cake (Single Layer)
items.description: The Best Of Two Worlds In A Single Layer Cake - A Waffle And A Brownie. With Deliciously Rich Melted Chocolate and Almonds. Your Doorway To Heaven! (Sorry! Our special waffle cakes do not allow for any customization. We do not provide candles or cutlery with this order)

items.name: Death by Chocolate Waffle Cake (Double Layer)
items.description: Signature dark chocolate double layer waffle cake layered inside and out with creamy White, Milk and Dark melted Belgian Chocolate. Triple the chocolate, triple the fun! (Sorry! Our special waffle cakes do not allow for any customization. We do not provide candles or cutlery with this order)

items.name: Berry Red Velvet Waffle Cake (Double Layer)
items.description:
"Original Red Velvet Double Layer Waffle Cake With Strawberry Compote + Creamy Cheesecake* filling And Melted White Chocolate Topped With Red Velvet Crumbs. A True Original - Enhanced!
*Cheesecake flavour filling, contains spray dried cheese powder
 (Sorry! Our special waffle cakes do not allow for any customization. We do not provide candles or cutlery with this order)"

items.name: Kiki & Oreo Waffle Cake (Double Layer)
items.description: Signature black velvet double layer waffle cake layered thick inside and out with Kiki spread and topped with Crushed Oreos. A universal favorite! (Sorry! Our special waffle cakes do not allow for any customization. We do not provide candles or cutlery with this order)

items.name: Almond Brownie Waffle Cake (Double Layer)
items.description: The Best Of Two Worlds In A Double Layer Cake - A Waffle And A Brownie. With Deliciously Rich Melted Chocolate and Almonds. Your Doorway To Heaven! (Sorry! Our special waffle cakes do not allow for any customization. We do not provide candles or cutlery with this order)

items.name: Mini Waffle Box of 4 - Chocolate
items.description: Can’t Pick One? Try A Carefully Curated Assortment of our Bestselling Chocolate Favorites. Includes Naked Nutella, Belgian Chocolate (Milk), Chocolate Overload (Dark) And Dark & White Fantasy Mini Waffles In An All-In-One Combo Pack.

items.name: Mini Waffle Box of 6 - Chocolate
items.description: Can’t Pick One? Try A Carefully Curated Assortment of our Bestselling Chocolate Favorites. Includes Naked Nutella, Belgian Chocolate (Dark), Belgian Chocolate (Milk), Kit kat, Chocolate Overload (Milk) And Dark & White Fantasy Mini Waffles In An All-In-One Combo Pack.

items.name: Mini Waffle Box of 4 - Assorted
items.description: In The Mood For Variety? Try A Carefully Curated Assortment Of Some Of Our Fan Favorites. Includes Belgian Chocolate (Milk), Almond Cocoa Butter, Red Velvet And Berry Red Velvet Mini Waffles In An All-In-One Combo Pack.

items.name: Mini Waffle Box of 6 - Assorted
items.description: In The Mood For Even More Variety? Try A Carefully Curated Assortment of Some of our Fan Favorites. Includes Naked Nutella, Belgian Chocolate (Milk), Chocolate Overload (Milk), Dark & White Fantasy, Red Velvet And Berry Red Velvet Mini Waffles In An All-In-One Combo Pack.

items.name: Honey Butter Waffle
items.description: Classic Crispy Waffle + Warm Melted Butter And Golden Honey Drizzle. An American Classic!

items.name: Maple Butter Waffle
items.description: Classic Crispy Waffle + Warm Melted Butter And Maple Syrup Drizzle. An American Classic!

items.name: Almond Cocoa Butter Waffle
items.description: Classic Crispy Waffle + Cocoa Butter Topped With Roasted Almonds. Nutty & Delicious!

items.name: Belgian Chocolate Milk Waffle
items.description: Classic Crispy Waffle + Melted Belgian Milk Chocolate. Simplicity At Its Best!

items.name: Belgian Chocolate Dark Waffle
items.description: Classic Crispy Waffle + Melted Belgian Dark Chocolate. Darker Simplicity!

items.name: Butterscotch Crunch Waffle
items.description: Classic Crispy Waffle + Crunchy Butterscotch Fudge. Go On Indulge!

items.name: Coffee Mocha Waffle
items.description: Classic Crispy Waffle + Melted Chocolate Infused With Coffee Crumbs. For Coffee Lovers!

items.name: Naked Nutella Waffle
items.description: Classic Crispy Waffle + Premium European Chocolate Hazelnut Spread (Add Banana If You Like). A Universal Favourite!

items.name: Kitkat Waffle
items.description: Classic Crispy Waffle + Melted Belgian White Chocolate And KitKat Bits. For KitKat Lovers!

items.name: Snickers Waffle
items.description: Classic Crispy Waffle + Roasted Peanut Butter with caramel sauce & melted Belgian Milk Chocolate, topped with real Snickers. A comforting classic reimagined.

items.name: Blueberry Cheesecake* Waffle
items.description: Classic Crispy Waffle layered with creamy Cheesecake filling & fresh Blueberry Compote topped with lotus biscoff crumbles. Deliciously Tart! *Cheesecake flavour filling, contains spray dried cheese powder

items.name: Strawberry Cheesecake* Waffle
items.description: Classic Crispy Waffle layered with creamy Cheesecake filling & fresh Strawberry Compote topped with lotus biscoff crumbles. Deliciously Tart! *Cheesecake flavour filling, contains spray dried cheese powder

items.name: Mango Cheesecake* Waffle
items.description: Classic Crispy Waffle layered with creamy Cheesecake filling & fresh Mango Compote topped with lotus biscoff crumbles. Mangoliciously Cheesy!*Cheesecake flavour filling, contains spray dried cheese powder

items.name: Biscoff Cheesecake* Waffle
items.description: Classic Crispy Waffle layered with creamy Cheesecake & Lotus Biscoff filling, topped with lotus biscoff crumbles.Its a Dreamy, Creamy & Caramelly affair! *Cheesecake flavour filling, contains spray dried cheese powder

items.name: Nutella Cheesecake* Waffle
items.description: Classic Crispy Waffle layered with creamy Cheesecake & Nutella filling topped with lotus biscoff crumbles. A nutty-cheesy affair!*Cheesecake flavour filling, contains spray dried cheese powder

items.name: Chocolate Overload Milk Waffle
items.description: Signature Dark Chocolate Waffle + Melted Belgian Milk Chocolate. Double The Chocolate!

items.name: Chocolate Overload Dark Waffle
items.description: Signature Dark Chocolate Waffle + Melted Belgian Dark Chocolate. Double The Chocolate!

items.name: Dark & White Fantasy Waffle
items.description: Signature Dark Chocolate Waffle + Fondant Of Melted Belgian White Chocolate. A Match Made In Heaven!

items.name: Triple Chocolate Waffle
items.description: Signature Dark Chocolate Waffle + 3 Layers Of Melted White Chocolate, Belgian Milk Chocolate And Belgian Dark Chocolate. The Most Indulgent Chocolate Waffle Ever!

items.name: Almond Brownie Waffle
items.description: The Best Of Two Worlds In A Single Bite - A Waffle And A Brownie. With Deliciously Rich Melted Chocolate and Almonds. Your Doorway To Heaven!

items.name: Lotus Biscoff Waffle
items.description: Signature Black Velvet Waffle + Fondant Of Melted White Chocolate Filled With Crunchy Lotus Biscoff Bits. An All Time Favorite!

items.name: Kiki & Oreo Cream Waffle
items.description: Signature Black Velvet Waffle + Our Special Blue Filling with Cookie Crunchy Oreo Bits Filling. Kiki Do You Love Me?

items.name: Red Velvet Waffle
items.description:
"Original Red Velvet Waffle + Creamy Cheesecake* filling And Melted White Chocolate. A True Original - Enhanced!
*Cheesecake flavour filling, contains spray dried cheese powder"

items.name: Berry Red Velvet Waffle
items.description:
"Original Red Velvet Waffle +Strawberry Compote + Creamy Cheesecake* filling And Melted White Chocolate. A True Original - Enhanced!
*Cheesecake flavour filling, contains spray dried cheese powder"

items.name: Ice Cream & Fudge Vanilla Waffle
items.description: Classic Crispy Waffle + Layer Of Chocolate Fudge Sauce Topped With Vanilla Ice Cream And Chocolate Fudge Drizzle. A Dreamy Combination!

items.name: Ice Cream & Fudge Chocolate Waffle
items.description: Classic Crispy Waffle + Layer Of Chocolate Fudge Sauce Topped with Chocolate Ice Cream And Chocolate Fudge Drizzle. A Dreamy Combination!

items.name: Triple Cookie
items.description: Original Red Velvet Waffle + A Divine Combination Of Biscoff, Oreo And KitKat Bits In Melted White Chocolate And Vanilla Ice Cream. A Must Try Symphony Of Flavours And Textures.

items.name: Rocky Road
items.description: Signature Dark Chocolate Waffle Loaded With A Combination Of Vanilla Ice Cream, Melted Milk Chocolate, Oreo Cookies And Roasted Almonds. Simply Majestic.

items.name: Ice Cream and Fudge Vanilla Mini Pancakes (8 Pieces)
items.description: Classic Mini Pancakes + Layer Of Chocolate Fudge Sauce Topped with Vanilla Ice Cream And Chocolate Fudge Drizzle. A Dreamy Combination!

items.name: Ice Cream and Fudge Chocolate Mini Pancakes (8 Pieces)
items.description: Classic Mini Pancakes + Layer Of Chocolate Fudge Sauce Topped with Chocolate Ice Cream And Chocolate Fudge Drizzle. A Dreamy Combination!

items.name: Triple Cookie Mini Pancakes (8 Pieces)
items.description: Original Red Velvet Mini Pancake + A divine combination of Biscoff, Oreo and KitKat bits in melted White Chocolate and Vanilla Ice Cream. A must try symphony of flavours and textures.

items.name: Rocky Road Mini Pancakes (8 Pieces)
items.description: Signature dark chocolate Mini Pancakes + Vanilla Ice Cream +  Oreos + Roasted almonds + melted milk chocolate. Simply majestic.

items.name: Lotus Biscoff Sundae (S)
items.description: A combination that you have never tasted before! Dense vanilla ice cream paired with classic waffle chunks and generously topped with real bananas, lotus biscoff spread, and biscuits. (Images are for representation purpose only)

items.name: Lotus Biscoff Sundae (L)
items.description: A combination that you have never tasted before! Dense vanilla ice cream paired with classic waffle chunks and generously topped with real bananas, lotus biscoff spread, and biscuits. (Images are for representation purpose only)

items.name: Berry Red Velvet Sundae (S)
items.description: We love this sundae berry berry much! Enjoy the richness of the red velvet waffle chunks and vanilla ice Small : Cream with the blast of fresh strawberry compote and white chocolate spread (Images are for representation purpose only)

items.name: Berry Red Velvet Sundae (L)
items.description: We love this sundae berry berry much! Enjoy the richness of the red velvet waffle chunks and vanilla ice cream with the blast of fresh strawberry compote and white chocolate spread (Images are for representation purpose only)

items.name: Choco Brownie Sundae (S)
items.description: A chocolicious combination is on your way! Chocolate ice cream topped with brownie waffle chunks, crushed Almonds, and choco fudge sauce will surely melt your heart. (Images are for representation purpose only)

items.name: Choco Brownie Sundae (L)
items.description: A chocolicious combination is on your way! Chocolate ice cream topped with brownie waffle chunks, crushed Almonds & choco fudge sauce will surely melt your heart. (Images are for representation purpose only)

items.name: Original Pancake & Waffle Mix
items.description: Now enjoy your favorite, 100% vegetarian, original waffles and pancakes at home with The Belgian Waffle Co. Pancake and Waffle premix. This super easy 3-step premix requires you to just Mix, Cook, and Enjoy! Try our Original, Choco Oats or Almond Flour variants with toppings of your choice.

items.name: Chocolate Oats Pancake & Waffle Mix
items.description: Now enjoy your favorite, 100% vegetarian, original waffles and pancakes at home with The Belgian Waffle Co. Pancake and Waffle premix. This super easy 3-step premix requires you to just Mix, Cook, and Enjoy! Try our Original, Choco Oats or Almond Flour variants with toppings of your choice.

items.name: Waffle Crisps - Double Chocolate Flavour
items.description: Thin Crunchy Wholesome And Delightfully Addictive. Uniquely Rich Flavours That Evoke Nostalgic Tastes. From The Creators Of The Original Waffle These Baked Waffle Crisps With Just The Right Chocolate Drizzle Make For The Perfect Bite-Sized And Versatile Snack That Is Sure To Hit The Spot. Enjoy With Coffee Or Tea Ice Cream Or Cake Nut Butters Or Spreads Or Just On Its Delicious Own.
